question: If the time of revolution is T in a satellite, then kinetic energy is proportional to which of the following:
explanation: The square of the period of any planet is proportional to the cube of the semimajor axis of its orbit. So r is inversely proportional to cube root of the square of T. And Kinetic energy is inversely proportional to r. Therefore, K.E is directly proportional to (T)<sup>-2/3</sup>
